meanings.definition: A type of marine worm that lacks a mouth and digestive system.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study pogonophorans to learn about unique marine creatures.
meanings.sent2: The pogonophorans live deep in the ocean where they feed on chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The pogonophorans decided to have a picnic without any food.
meanings.sent4: In the dark depths of the sea, the pogonophorans are like ghosts without mouths.
meanings.sent5: The pogonophorans, with their strange bodies, are a mystery to marine biologists.

meanings.definition: Organisms belonging to the phylum Pogonophora, characterized by their tube-like bodies and tentacles for feeding.
meanings.sent1: The pogonophorans use their tentacles to catch food in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Many pogonophorans live near hydrothermal vents on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: At the underwater party, the pogonophorans were the best dancers with their tube-like bodies.
meanings.sent4: The pogonophorans, like graceful dancers, sway in the underwater ballet of life.
meanings.sent5: Among the strange creatures of the deep, the pogonophorans stand out with their unique features.
